channel.title: Scrum on MinuteMedia Tech and Product Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Scrum on MinuteMedia Tech and Product Blog

item.title: The Lost Chapter to Making Your Pods Successful
item.description: You've reached the stage of exploring the option of utilizing the pod structure or maybe you've already started it. You've reviewed the different guides which talk about processes, structure and efficiency, everything sounds great but you feel like something is missing… You are right, there is a missing chapter which relates to the human aspect and the effect moving to pods has on it.

item.title: How Monorepo is helping us work better
item.description: As any other mature startup that is moving to its growth stage, we had to rebuild our infrastructure.
